body:
I found these snippets:
<details>
<summary>https://psalm.dev/r/9e07d654ce</summary>

```php
<?php

$repo = new stdClass();

$callback = fn(): mixed => $repo->test;


// use callback
$callback();
```

```
Psalm output (using commit b904b1d):

INFO: UnusedVariable - 3:1 - Variable $repo is never referenced
```
</details>

<details>
<summary>https://psalm.dev/r/809efed255</summary>

```php
<?php

function test(stdClass $a): mixed {
	return fn(): mixed => $a->test;
}

test(new stdClass());
```

```
Psalm output (using commit b904b1d):

INFO: UnusedParam - 3:24 - Param $a is never referenced in this method
```
</details>
Thank you, this was really fast. Time for some PHP8.
